DataGen for calculating serialized pr beginning serial

con:configuration.script:
def serializedProductStartSerialNumber = context.expand( '${Create initial data and products#serializedProductStartSerialNumber}' ).toInteger();
int lessSerialNumber = serializedProductStartSerialNumber - 1 ;

con:testStep.name: Datasource for adding item with serial number for serialized pr invalid cases

con:configuration.row: <xml-fragment><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Given properties for the test steps#nonexistingNumber}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Add serialized aggregated item#req_quantity}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${DataGen for calculating serialized pr beginning serial#beginningSerialNumber}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create initial data and products#res_serializedProductSpecExtId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">BI_WITH_ID_NOT_FOUND</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/></xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create stockout business interaction#res_biId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Given properties for the test steps#maxLimitQuantity}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${DataGen for calculating serialized pr beginning serial#beginningSerialNumber}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create initial data and products#res_serializedProductSpecExtId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">THERE_IS_NOT_ENOUGH_PRODUCT_WITH_GIVEN_QUANTITY</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/></xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create stockout business interaction#res_biId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Add serialized aggregated item#req_quantity}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${DataGen for calculating serialized pr beginning serial#beginningSerialNumber}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Given properties for the test steps#invalidSpecExtId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">NO_PRODUCT_SPEC_FOUND_WITH_PROVIDED_EXTERNAL_ID</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/></xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create stockout business interaction#res_biId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Add serialized aggregated item#req_quantity}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${DataGen for calculating serialized pr beginning serial#lessSerialNumber}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create initial data and products#res_serializedProductSpecExtId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">REQUESTED_STARTSERIAL_IS_NOT_IN_CURRENT_RANGE</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/></xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create stockout business interaction#res_biId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Add serialized aggregated item#req_quantity}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${DataGen for calculating serialized pr beginning serial#moreSerialNumber}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">${Create initial data and products#res_serializedProductSpecExtId}</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config">REQUESTED_INPUT_AND_PRODUCT_NOT_EQUAL</con:entry><con:entry xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/></xml-fragment>
